entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Rock River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:35 PM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -25.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rock River 8:00 PM MST Thursday 16 February 2023
Temperature: -25.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -28.2°C
Wind: NW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 24.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow late in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains late in the afternoon. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Local blowing snow. Wind east 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains. Wind becoming light before morning. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of snow. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of snow. High minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 16 February 2023
